Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via: Central, Lake, Austin, Washington and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
